page.title: 09FORDHAM FETE
page.content: On Saturday the 8th of June the Fordham fete was held.The procession was shorter than usual and was led by the bagpipes, followed by people in fancy dress.I do not like the sound of the bagpipes so I did not enjoy the procession.When I got into the field it looked very colourful.The first thing that caught my eye was the crane because it was so big and brightly coloured.Having a ride on this crane was the first thing I did.Then I walked round the stalls and played the nail game which was very easy to play. After this I looked at the other stalls, the tombola, the coconut shy,bowling for the pig,ice cream van and lots more.The stall which made the most money was the raffle, it raised Â£170.You could also watch eggs hatching out in an incubator.The most exciting thing was the crane ride.
